page.title: 09The Brook
page.content: Some parts of {the brook} are clean and other parts oily. In it have been dumped poles, wood, tyres, bicycles, trolleys and plastic bags. Half way along it is polluted and no wild life lives there. if you walk along the brook at the clean parts you can see {newts, frogs, fish, toads, pike, minnows, water voles and rats.}The creatures that are seen on the ground are {spiders, moorhens, blackbirds and moles.} plants found down by the brook are {nettles, cowslips, rape, holly bushes and small trees.} At one point there are some plants across the brook underneath are leaches and sinking sand. Alongside the brook is a path and at one part the brook is shallow enough to walk across wearing boots.
